item.description:
Hello Everyone,
This seminar is not an actual Meetup but I'm inviting the members of the Metro West Investors Meetup Group in case you're interested. There will be four speakers covering an overview of the latest in green, energy efficient design and construction, including solar, geothermal, insulation, airtightness, indoor air quality and comfort, governments incentives for going green, and much more! Please RSVP to Elias Papadopoulos, the broker who is hosting the event at his office in Brookline: 617-566-0300 eliasremax@gmail.com. You may also email us for a PDF Flyer for the event.

group.name: Metro West Investors - Boston area Real Estate Group

item.name: Green Homes Seminar Thursday June 7th
